name: Crossout: Horsemen of Apocalypse - War
storyline: Purchasing a pack gives the player early access to some structural faction parts. These parts will become available immediately upon purchase and are not re-issued once the corresponding reputation level is reached. For some parts you can only have one set of them on the account. When purchasing multiple packs with same parts they do not stack!
summary: This pack includes: unique armoured vehicle “War machine”; Weapon: epic crossbow “Phoenix”, rare course rocket “AT Wasp”, 2 pcs.; unique epic cabin “Echo”; “Twin wheels”, 6 pcs.; Engine “Hot red” of epic rarity; Structural parts of “War”; Unique character portrait “Victor Pyrrhus”; Rare decor “Furnace”, 2 pcs.; Exclusive sticker “Red horse”; Spray can with unique paint “Scorching sand”; Increases the maximum number of parts used to 55; 1500 in-game coins.
